comments:
Using I200412142000

Having the following annotation:
public @interface Annot {
    int    id();
    String synopsis();
    String engineer() default "[unassigned]"; 
    String date()     default "[unimplemented]"; 
}

Trying to rename for example method synopsis leads to the following error:

Trying to get a preview before renaming leads to the same error.
Same error happens when changing a method signature (also for preview)
Same behavior happens when method signatures are changed on type enum.
Erol, this is *not* a text bug. Refactorings belong to the UI component.

The problem is that the search engine does not find the declaration of the
originally selected method.

A work around would be to disable this. However given that annotations aren't
heavily used we can ship M4 without fixing it.

Fixed for I20041216-0800.

Now checking in an assertion that declaration search returns original method.
Fix is mainly to prevent bug 81059 from happening.

For the records: Missing annotation search is jdt.core bug 83230.
Bug 81441 is for the UI side of this problem.
*** Bug 80922 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
